sentences.en: Neutrinos from a subsidiary decay process are the ones to be detected.
sentences.cn: 将探测到来自次要衰变过程的微中子.

sentences.en: Public transportation played a subsidiary role.
sentences.cn: 公共交通起辅助的作用.

sentences.en: Public transportation plays a subsidiary role.
sentences.cn: 公共交通起辅助的作用。

sentences.en: Subsidiary company get preferential treatment when it come to subcontract work.
sentences.cn: 分公司承接转包(二包)工作时会得到优惠待遇.
温度在这里起补充作用.

sentences.en: The company is a wholly-owned subsidiary of a large multinational.
sentences.cn: 这是一家大型跨国企业的全资子公司。

sentences.en: The company placed much money in its foreign subsidiary.
sentences.cn: 那家公司投下巨额资金于国外的子公司.

sentences.en: The economics ministry has increasingly played a subsidiary role to the finance ministry.
sentences.cn: 经济部已经越来越成了财政部的附属了。

sentences.en: The investor has substantial control over the foreign subsidiary enterprise.
sentences.cn: 投资者对于国外子公司具有实际的控制权.

sentences.en: The Locomotive Construction Company Ltd is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Trust.
sentences.cn: 机车建筑有限公司是该托拉斯的全资子公司。

sentences.en: The marketing department has always played a subsidiary role to the sales department.
sentences.cn: 营销部一直都扮演着销售部的辅助角色。

sentences.en: The subsidiary channels have a thickness in the range 6 - 12 m.
sentences.cn: 次要河道砂岩体的厚度为 6-12 米.

sentences.en: These needs may be classified into two subsidiary sets.
sentences.cn: 这种需要可以再分为两类.

sentences.en: They demanded the divorce of the subsidiary from the parent firm.
sentences.cn: 他们要求子公司与母公司分离.

sentences.en: They have signed a subsidiary treaty.
sentences.cn: 他们签署了一次援助协定.

sentences.en: We offer accounting as a subsidiary course.
sentences.cn: 我们开设会计课,作为副修课程.

phrases.tran_cn: 明细分类帐；辅助分类帐
全资子公司；全资附属机构；全资拥有子公司
全资附属公司；全部控股子公司

trans.tran_cn: 附带的，附属的，次要的，助的，帮助的，补足的
trans.tran_en: connected with, but less important than, something else

trans.tran_cn: 附属事物，附属机构，子公司，附属者，附属品
trans.tran_en: a company that is owned or controlled by another larger company
